markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Staff Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1193) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 75</row>

**Archetype** [Staff Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=37)

**Prerequisites**
Dexterity 16; Trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1); Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3); trained with at least one of the following weapons: [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12), [bo staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17), [halfling sling staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=78), or any weapon in the [spear](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=14) or [polearm](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=11) group (referred to in this archetype as “your staff”)

</column>

---

When you [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36), [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81), or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37) while wielding your staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to any [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check required and add 5 feet to the distance you can Leap vertically and horizontally. You can [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) and [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) even if you don’t have a free hand, provided you are wielding your staff. Finally, when you roll a success on a check to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) while wielding your staff, you get a critical success instead.

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the staff acrobat archetype.

<title level="2">Staff Acrobat Dedication leads to...</title>
[Bullying Staff](/Feats.aspx?ID=1194), [Levering Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=1196), [Pivot Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=1198), [Staff Sweep](/Feats.aspx?ID=1195), [Whirlwind Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1197)
name: Staff Acrobat Dedication
prerequisite: Dexterity 16; Trained in Acrobatics; Trained in Athletics; trained with at least one of the following weapons: staff, bo staff, halfling sling staff, or any weapon in the spear or polearm group (referred to in this archetype as “your staff”)

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 75</row>

**Prerequisites**
Dexterity 16; Trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1); Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3); trained with at least one of the following weapons: [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12), [bo staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17), [halfling sling staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=78), or any weapon in the [spear](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=14) or [polearm](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=11) group (referred to in this archetype as “your staff”)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Gain bonuses when using your staff as an implement to aid Acrobatics and Athletics actions.
</summary>
